mapper.insert: insert into f_board (f_board_num, f_board_title, f_board_content, f_board_date) values (f_board_seq.nextval, #{f_board_title}, #{f_board_content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select f_board_num, f_board_title, f_board_content, f_board_hits, f_board_date, f_reply_count, freelancer.f_num, f_id from f_board, freelancer where f_board_num=#{f_board_num} and f_board.f_num = freelancer.f_num
mapper.update: update f_board set f_board_title=#{f_board_title}, f_board_content=#{f_board_content} where f_board_num=#{f_board_num}
mapper.select: select f_board_num, f_board_title, f_board_content, f_board_hits, f_board_date, f_reply_count, f_num from f_board where f_board_num>0 order by f_board_num desc, f_board_date desc
select f_board_num, f_board_title, f_board_content, f_board_hits, f_board_date, f_reply_count, f_num from f_board where f_board_num>0 order by f_board_num desc, f_board_date desc limit #{page}, 10

select f_board_num, f_board_title, f_board_content, f_board_hits, f_board_date, f_reply_count, f_num from f_board where f_board_num>0 order by f_board_num desc, f_board_date desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
